suite.name: ComputersDatabase

test.name: First Name Should be ACE

kw.name: Begin Web Test
Should Be True
kw.doc: Fails if the given condition is not true.

kw.name: Set Variable If
kw.doc: Sets variable based on the given condition.

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.msg: Browser driver log file created to: C:\Robot_Learning\ComputersDatabase4\Results\edge\nul
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Title Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that the current page title equals ``title``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

Prepara el navegador recibido por argumento para los tests. Concretamente, se comprueba la validez del argumento, se preparan las opciones pertinentes, se abre el navegador a la URL, se comprueba el titulo y se maximiza la ventana

kw.name: First Result Computer name Should Be ${T1_FIRST_NAME}
Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.

kw.name: Close All Browsers
kw.doc: Closes all open browsers and resets the browser cache.

test.doc: Cargar la p√°gina y verificar que el primer valor del campo _Computer name_ de la lista es ACE

kw.name: First Result Computer name Should Be ${T2_NAME}
Element Text Should Be
kw.msg: Verifying element 'xpath://*[@id="main"]/table/tbody/tr[1]/td[1]' contains exact text 'ASCI White'.
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.msg: Verifying element 'xpath://*[@id="main"]/table/tbody/tr[1]/td[2]' contains exact text '01 Jan 2001'.
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.msg: Verifying element 'xpath://*[@id="main"]/table/tbody/tr[1]/td[3]' contains exact text '01 Jan 2006'.
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.

kw.name: Close All Browsers
kw.doc: Closes all open browsers and resets the browser cache.

test.doc: Cargar la p√°gina, darle a Next, para ir a la p√°gina 2 y verificar que el primer valor del campo _Computer Name_ de la lista es ASCI White, _Introduced_=01/01/2001, _Discontinued_=01/01/2006 y _Company_=IBM

suite.doc: Ejercicios de automatizaci√≥n de frontal con Robot Framework - Para probar todos los navegadores, ejecutar ``run-tests.bat``
